definition: to start over/to do sth all over again
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
lit. to return in a swirl of dust (idiom)/fig. to regroup and come back even stronger/to make a comeback

sentences.english: Eventually, TV reasserted itself into my life.
sentences.chinese: 电视后来在我的生活中卷土重来。

sentences.english: THERE was no return of the mutineers - not so much as another shot out of the woods.
sentences.chinese: 反叛者们没有卷土重来，树林中再也没听到枪声。

sentences.english: Thrawn did, though, have some sort of plan to return.
sentences.chinese: 然而，索龙确实想到过卷土重来的计划。

sentences.english: Of the two, time is the most valuable, for it cannot be replenished.
sentences.chinese: 而其中时间更加贵重，因为时间是不能重来的。

sentences.english: Ma reflected that if she had the chance to do it again, she probably would not say that.
sentences.chinese: 马诺表示，如果能重来一次，她可能就不会那样说了。

sentences.english: Now Pitkowsky, 46, and Trauner, 54, are back.
sentences.chinese: 如今，46岁的皮考斯基和54岁的特劳纳卷土重来。

sentences.english: That problem has brought compressed-air energy storage roaring back.
sentences.chinese: 这一问题使得‘压缩空气储能’卷土重来。

sentences.english: His hatred of Trina came back upon him like a returning surge.
sentences.chinese: 他对屈丽娜的痛恨象卷土重来的浪潮，又回复了。

sentences.english: They squat in illegal structures, which Beijing destroys as it keeps expanding.
sentences.chinese: 他们蜷缩在违章建筑里，被政府摧毁又卷土重来。

sentences.english: And the beast shall come forth surrounded by a roiling cloud of vengeance.
sentences.chinese: 野兽将靠复仇之云卷土重来。

sentences.english: Three days later, Kearns, once again driving the Galaxie, reappeared for his appointment with Neill.
sentences.chinese: 三天后，卡恩斯卷土重来，如约见到了内尔。

sentences.english: No word yet on whether horsemeat will make a comeback.
sentences.chinese: 但还不能肯定马肉是否会卷土重来。

sentences.english: Ten years ago, when dinosaurs began to make their greatest comeback in 100,000 years, everyone wondered what the appeal was for kids.
sentences.chinese: 十年以前，恐龙开始以十万年来未有的声势卷土重来。

sentences.english: Capri pants are making a comeback and can also be found here.
sentences.chinese: 卡普里裤正在卷土重来，也可以在这里找到。

sentences.english: And then it all begins over again.
sentences.chinese: 然后所有一切又会重来一次。

sentences.english: Turtlenecks are having a sudden revival in 2015.

definition: (literary) to slip/(of looks etc) to fade away/(of time) to slip away/to squander (time, opportunities)/to dillydally
to follow the track of an overturned cart/to repeat a disastrous policy
to turn around/to look back/to recollect
